channel.title: Requesting a Client Backround
channel.description:
Hello moparscape, Virus King here! . So i come to u and my source is Aggroth and (im sorry amy) but i need to replace the backround so it matches my server name, DealtX. This is what it looks like now. http://prntscr.com/2ueajl
I would like it to be:
Backround with someone hitting a high dds smack againts someone. [img]http://i.imgur.com/qdwRIF3.png[/img]
On the bottom in white letters (small and 6 font) "DealtX. All Rights Reserved." Where the text says aggroth, change it to DealtX and make the letters blue and black outline in 3d (if possible)
If anybody is willing to do this, i will rep you and if u join my server when its up you will get GFX rank. Thank you!
